summary: Documentary about the making of the 1939 MGM classic film The Wizard of Oz. Includes interviews of cast and crew members, their families and fans of the film.
cast: Angela Lansbury|Mervyn LeRoy|Ray Bolger|Jack Haley|Judy Garland|Walt Disney|Shirley Temple|Liza Minnelli|Lorna Luft|Billie Burke|Margaret Hamilton|John Lahr|Buddy Ebsen|Robert A. Baum|Harold Arlen|E.Y. Harburg|David O. Selznick|King Vidor|Jerry Maren|Meinhardt Raabe|Adrian|A. Arnold Gillespie|Robert Young|Joey Luft|Jack Paar|Mickey Rooney|Louis B. Mayer|Fiorello LaGuardia|James Stewart|Charles Laughton|Vivien Leigh|Bob Hope|Victor Fleming|Herbert Stothart|Charles Becker|Clara Blandick|Bette Davis|Arthur Freed|Bert Lahr|Elsa Lanchester|Myrna Loy|Frank Morgan|Laurence Olivier|Margaret Raabe|George Raft|Norma Shearer|Terry|Tom Snyder|Howard Strickling
keywords: wizard of oz|musical filmmaking|making of film|dog|behind the scenes
title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz: 50 Years of Magic
